text: Uninvented Story () is a 1964 Soviet drama film directed by Vladimir Gerasimov.Война как мера всех вещей: Роман Носиков о нечестных склоках на величииАлександр Леньков. ДосьеУмерла Жанна Прохоренко == Plot == Anatoly and Varya got married, but Anatoly was very jealous. He is jealous of her not only for work, but also for his friend. Unable to bear constant quarrels, Varya goes to the Ural.Непридуманная история == Cast == * Zhanna Prokhorenko as Varya * Georgi Yepifantsev as Anatoly * Leonid Kuravlyov as Kostya * Vitali Doronin as Stepan * Valentina Berezutskaya as Zhura * Svetlana KharitonovaНепридуманная история (1964) Full Cast & Crew == References == == External links == * Category:1964 films Category:Russian-language films Category:Soviet drama films Category:Soviet films
title: Uninvented Story
